text: Javier Ernesto Jiménez Scull (born November 16, 1989) is a Cuban volleyball player, who plays as an outside hitter for the Cuba men's national volleyball team. On 2014 he became the first Cuban player ever to be transferred to a non-Cuban team (PAOK VC) having acquired at first the approval of the Cuban Sports Ministry. He played for PAOK VC from 2014-2016 having a major contribution to the team's first ever Championship, including the first ever Double (Championship and Cup) on 2015 and the Championship of the 2016 Greek Volleyleague. During his period in Thessaloniki and PAOK VC he was much beloved by the PAOK fans, especially for his way of celebrating points. ==Sporting achievements== ===National Championships/Cups=== * 2014/2015 20px Greek Championship, with PAOK * 2014/2015 20px Greek Cup, with PAOK * 2015/2016 20px Greek Championship, with PAOK * 2019/2020 16px Estonian Cup 2019, with Saaremaa ==References== ==External links== * profile at FIVB.org * FIVB profile * Scoresway profile * Jimenez is leaving PAOK * Jimenez's first day at Thessaloniki Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Cuban men's volleyball players Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:PAOK V.C. players Category:Cuban sportsmen Category:Olympic volleyball players of Cuba Category:Volleyball players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Greece Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Italy Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Estonia Category:Central American and Caribbean Games medalists in volleyball Category:Central American and Caribbean Games bronze medalists for Cuba Category:Competitors at the 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games
title: Javier Jiménez (volleyball)
